client-settings.name: 一般社団法人 池田市医師会

extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:auto !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} #caria_change_bar { margin: 10% auto 0; } .menu_title span { font-size: 100%; } #header.a-logo-fixed .header-bg { margin: 44px auto 0; }
